Description: Electric Ceramic Knife Sharpener:

  • Stone and ABS knife sharpener
  • Electric powered #600 grade diamond grinding stone
  • Knife guide slot keeps knife at fixed angle for safe sharpening
  • Assist roller to prevent over-sharpening and control pressure
  • Safety cover contains grindings and dust
  • Indicator light
  • Requires four AA batteries (not included)
  • 5 year manufacturer's warranty
